articles.title: Vivo launches ‘color-changing’ V23 Pro with dual-camera notch - The Verge
articles.description: Vivo has announced the V23 and V23 Pro, the latest phones in the company’s mainstream V series that sells a ton in India and other Asian countries. The gold model is able to change colors in sunlight.

articles.title: Asian shares slip as rising U.S. yields hit tech firms - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks slipped on Wednesday following a mixed Wall Street session as higher U.S. Treasury yields weighed on global tech firms and pushed the dollar to a five-year high against Japan's yen.
